name: thehomebutton.gitHub.io
body: ### who i am. i started off as a programmer in hong kong. now i have moved to macau to look for opportunities. now i am a cyber security engineer who works for a high-profile financial institute. i want to be a software engineer but the tides have driven me towards the security side. might as well combine the two in the days to come. ### what i learn. probabilities. fuzzing. hacking. algorithm. languages. cooking. bartending. ### what i read. bayesian methods for hackers ### contact you can contact me for anything via [this email](mailto:the.home.button.mc@gmail.com).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
